nodes.text: Zoraster was a planet located within the Zoraster system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Zoraster sector. It was the homeworld of the Human male Condi. At some point by 28 BBY, the slaver Krayn captured Condi, taking him off-world and forcing him to work aboard his starship among other slaves.

Zoraster was first mentioned in the 2001 young readers novel Jedi Quest: Path to Truth, written by Jude Watson. The Zoraster system, and therefore the planet itself, was placed in grid square U-13 by the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
